article_title: Walsh weighs in at Gazette on health care, energy and veterans issues

og.description: U.S. Sen. John Walsh, D-Mont., stopped by the Billings Gazette late Friday a few hours after being appointed by Gov. Steve Bullock to replace former Democratic Sen. Max Baucus.
